column4: does anyone know about making a logical hdd array? not trying to make a redundant array, but rather just mass storage, and i dont really know how to set it up using a partition editor
Is there a JBOD option in the partitioner?
OK, just a thought. JBOD is 'Just a Bunch Of Disks" which is one way to logically put a bunch of disks together. Google for setting up a RAID - there's at least one tutorial out there that I know of
